task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Interest in Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Breaks at Innovatech
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: Innovatech Solutions is exploring a new 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' program to support employee well-being. These 15-20 minute guided sessions would be offered twice a week. Your anonymous feedback is valuable in helping us understand interest and preferences. Please take a few minutes to complete this short survey.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15-20 minute guided 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' offered twice a week at Innovatech Solutions?
Which days of the week would you most likely be able to attend such a session? (Select all that apply)
What time slot(s) during the mid-day (approx. 11 AM - 2 PM) would best suit you for these sessions? (Select all that apply)
To what extent do you feel a mid-day break for mindfulness and stretching would help improve your personal well-being or productivity?
What, if any, are your primary concerns or potential barriers to participating in such a program? (e.g., workload, meeting schedules, not interested, physical limitations)
If such sessions were offered, would you prefer more emphasis on mindfulness, stretching, or an equal balance of both?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: For next year's Step Challenge, Innovatech Solutions should consider increasing the number or variety of prize categories, as this was a prominent suggestion. Additionally, exploring improvements to the mobile app or offering a shorter challenge duration could enhance participant satisfaction and address other common feedback points.
